summary: Added unit test suite for `useKlareStores` in `src/hooks/__tests__/useKlareStores.test.tsx`, covering aggregated summaries and interactions across stores.
Configured `jest.setup.ts` with AsyncStorage and MMKV mocks plus Expo module stubs to stabilize hook tests.
Created `src/store/__tests__/useLifeWheelStore.test.ts` with supabase mocking pattern, exercising `calculateAverage`, `findLowestAreas`, and `updateLifeWheelArea` success/error paths.
